item.title: Communicating with R and Python
item.description: In my computational biology class, we’ve been learning how to use both R code and Python in R studio. Now, I’m a total novice at coding and so when I first saw this I was like “Why? Why do I need to do this?”. And then it finally clicked. My parents immigrated here in the the early 1990s and have been here since. However in order to live in Texas, they’ve learned a decent amount of English (and a little bit of Spanish).
